sunrider_missions.findSunrider_talkToPirateDesc: Talk to a pirate boss in comms directory in a permanent pirate settlement to find information on the salvage captain, %s.
sunrider_missions.findSunrider_talkToSalvagerDesc: You've learned that %s is currently retired on the planet %s. Pay him a visit to find the location of the Sunrider.
sunrider_missions.findSunrider_recoverDesc: Search the %s and recover the Sunrider.
sunrider_missions.mission2_recoverDataDesc: Bring the Sunrider to a skilled technical team somewhere, to perform a data recovery on the ship's memory.
sunrider_missions.mission2_recoverDataDesc1: You could try asking an administrator in a Tri-Tachyon planet, or a secretary in one of your own colonies if you have Nexerelin enabled.
sunrider_missions.mission2_recoverDataDescGargoyle: Alternatively, you might know someone at the Galatia Academy who could help with this task.
sunrider_missions.mission2_recoverDataDescKween: Or perhaps, a prominent researcher from the Sindrian Fuel Company may have the required expertise.
sunrider_missions.mission2_recoverDataNextStep: Bring the Sunrider to someone who can recover its memory
sunrider_missions.mission3_desc: Ava wants to discuss the potential weaknesses of the Nightmares with you.
sunrider_missions.mission4_goToSystemDesc: Go to the %s and track down the mysterious fleet that the drunken man was rambling about. See if you can find anything interesting as well.
sunrider_missions.mission4_returnDesc: Return to %s and speak with %s. You may be able to get his comms ID from the bar.
sunrider_missions.missionVows_goToBeholderDesc: Take a young Luddic couple to their wedding on %s.
sunrider_missions.missionVows_findCurateDesc: Go to the shrine on %s and find the curate to officiate the wedding.
sunrider_missions.missionVows_returnToBeholderDesc: Take a young Luddic couple to their wedding on %s.
sunrider_missions.missionVows_partyDesc: The wedding is taking place on %s. You should go there within five days of receiving the invitation.
sunrider_missions.missionVows_partyNextStep: Go to %s within 5 days for the wedding
sunrider_missions.missionShowdown_firstSystemDesc: Go to the %s to look for the Ryuvian fleet.
sunrider_missions.missionShowdown_secondSystemDesc: The Ryuvian fleet is thought to be in %s; locate and destroy it.
sunrider_missions.missionShowdown_reportBackDesc: You have defeated the Ryuvian fleet. Report back to a %s or %s administrator to receive payment.
sunrider_missions.missionShowdown_reportBackNextStep: Report back to a %s or %s administrator
